Audio Description: On a tan background a black and white photo of grim-faced soldier stares out from this poster as he points his right finger at the viewer. He is wearing a metal helmet with chin-strap and a wool coat buttoned up to the neck. He is carrying sleeping roll on his shoulders and the top of a rucksack  is partially visible on his chest. Under the picture, on a white strip, are the words “You can help me build a gun”, in red and black letters. Beneath is a tan strip are the words “You can learn quickly and you will be working to win”. At the bottom of the poster,  a black strip with white letters reads “Ask at any employment exchange for advice and full details. A job is waiting for you”.
Creator: Great Britain. Ministry of Labour and National Service
Rights: Materials in this collection are made available by the Illinois State Library. To request reproductions or inquire about permissions, contact:  islimg@ilsos.net. Please cite the item title and collection name.

Title: You can help build me a gun: you can learn quickly and you will be working to win: ask at any employment exchange for advice and full details: a job is waiting for you
